segments.text: Hello , Kevin . I hate to do this , but I have to cancel our appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! Why ? I was looking forward to seeing you at my new place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I really wanted to come , too . But something unexpected in shanghai have come up . I have to fly out for a few days , but I'll be back soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem.Call me when you get back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should have some free time next week . Say , next Wednesday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good for me , but do you think you'll be back by then ? I'd really like to see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm expecting to come back on Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1
